actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that support and maintenance furnished in kind to an eligible individual living in another person's household shall not serve to reduce such individual's SSI benefits and shall be disregarded in determining such individual's income for benefit purposes.

summary.text: Amends Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the reduction in supplemental security income benefits which is presently imposed when the recipient is living in another person's household.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that support and maintenance furnished in kind to an eligible individual living in another person's household shall not serve to reduce such individual's SSI benefits and shall be disregarded in determining such individual's income for benefit purposes.
